level.heading: Definition.
level.text: As used in this chapter, "mental illness" has the same meaning as that given to the term by section 21-501.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 19-169 substituted "mental illness" for "mentally ill person".

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 19-169, see notes under § 21-501.

level.heading: Miscellaneous Notes
level.text: "Sec. 35. No provision of this act shall impair any right or obligation existing under law."
